page.title: 05Ecology south: FINTRY
page.content: Mainly upland grassland, moorland and conifer forest on north{Campsie Fells. {Dunmore & Dungoil}are N. facing basalt cliffs. Lowland farmland & woodland. {Endrick Water and Craigton Pond. { {Dunmore/Kilewnan Burn:}Mixed woodland & grassland; bracken,rushes,tormentil, heath bedstraw. buzzard, meadow pipit. {Culcreuch/Craigton Lade:}Wooded glade; sycamore, Norway spruce, beech, ash, maple, oak, daffodils, coltsfoot, lesser celandine, pink purslane, yellow flag, broad-leaved helleborine (rare), wren, tree creeper, rabbit, mole, grey squirrel. Linked to - {Craigton Pond:}an old mill pond newly refurbished; common toad, frog, grey heron, mallard, water crowfoot, alder. {Endrick Water:}Spawning salmon and brown trout, common sandpiper.
